title: Basic Arithmetic Calculation
description: Verify that the calculator performs basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) correctly.

steps.description: Press Enter key or click '=' button to calculate.

title: Percentage Extraction Calculation
description: Verify the calculator can extract percentage values accurately (e.g. calculate 20% of 150).

steps.description: Verify the output is '30', which is 20% of 150.
Use keyboard to input equivalent expression for percentage extraction.
Calculate and verify the correctness of result.

title: Percentage Addition and Subtraction
description: Validate addition and subtraction operations involving percentages (e.g. 100 + 10% equals 110).

title: Complex Arithmetic with Parentheses
description: Ensure calculation respects operation precedence and parentheses correctly in nested expressions.

title: Automatic History Log Recording
description: Check that every completed calculation is saved in the history log correctly and in sequence.

steps.description: Verify the history log contains entry '5 + 10 = 15' at most recent position.
Verify the history log updated sequentially with new entry '20 - 3 = 17'.
Clear input and perform another calculation '50 * 2'.
History log should now have three entries in correct order.

title: Keyboard Shortcut Input Mapping
description: Ensure all supported keyboard shortcuts map correctly to calculator inputs without lag or missed entries.

steps.description: Each digit appears correctly in the input field.
Operators and parentheses appear correctly in input.
Use Enter key to calculate and Escape key to clear input.
Calculation triggers on Enter and input clears on Escape.

title: UI Responsiveness Across Devices
description: Validate the UI layout and usability on desktop, tablet, and smartphone screen sizes, maintaining Neon Pulse theme clarity.

steps.description: Open application in desktop browser window and verify UI elements are arranged and sized correctly.
UI remains fully functional and visually clear with correct Neon Pulse theme.
Resize window to tablet dimensions and verify UI adapts.
All controls remain accessible and usable; layout adjusts for smaller screen.
Open application on smartphone device or emulator.
UI renders correctly with appropriate tap targets and visibility.

title: Animation Trigger and Performance
description: Verify that UI animations trigger appropriately on user interactions and do not cause performance or visual issues.

steps.description: Click buttons and perform multiple calculations.
Animations activate smoothly on button presses and input updates.
Observe UI performance during rapid input sequences.
No lag, flicker, or glitches occur during animations.

title: Error Handling for Invalid Input
description: Ensure application handles invalid inputs gracefully, providing appropriate feedback without crashing.

steps.description: Input invalid characters or malformed expressions like '5 ++ 2' or incomplete parentheses.
Verify that an error message or indication is shown and application does not crash.
Input division by zero expression '10 / 0' and calculate.
Application displays error or handles case without crashing.
